mod.name: Gensokyo
mod.description: An alternate Act 1, 2, and 3 mod inspired by Touhou Project.

cards.name: Crescent Moon Slash
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage to ALL enemies.
If this kills an enemy, repeat this effect.

cards.name: Crescent Moon Slash+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage to ALL enemies.
If this kills an enemy, repeat this effect.

cards.name: Greater Split: Horizontal+
cards.description: Deal 42 damage and apply 1 Stun to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Greater Split: Vertical
cards.description:
Deal 39 damage.
Apply 1 Stun.

cards.name: Private Square
cards.description:
Take an extra turn after this one. End your turn.
Add a copy of this card that costs 2 more to your hand.
If any enemy takes damage while this is in your hand, exhaust it.

cards.name: Private Square+
cards.description:
Take an extra turn after this one. End your turn.
Add a copy of this card that costs 2 more to your hand.
If any enemy takes damage while this is in your hand, exhaust it.

cards.name: Shooting Star
cards.description: Add a copy of another card in your deck to your hand.

cards.name: Shooting Star+
cards.description: Add a copy of another card in your deck to your hand.

cards.name: Taboo "Four of a Kind"
cards.description:
This turn, your next card is played 1 additional time(s).
Increase the effect of ALL copies of this card by 1 this combat.
Can only be played once per turn.

cards.name: Taboo "Four of a Kind"+
cards.description:
This turn, your next card is played 1 additional time(s).
Increase the effect of ALL copies of this card by 1 this combat.
Can only be played once per turn.

cards.name: Butterfly
cards.description:
Unplayable.
If this card is exhausted, lose 2 Max HP this combat.

cards.name: Embers of Love
cards.description: A random enemy gains 2 Strength.

cards.name: Frozen!
cards.description: When this card is drawn, reduce its cost by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Infected Wound
cards.description: While this card is in your hand, take 3 damage whenever you play an Attack.

cards.name: Mind Shatter
cards.description:
Shuffle ALL non-exhausting cards in your exhaust pile into your draw pile.
Lose 2 HP for each card moved this way.

cards.name: Philosophy of the Despised
cards.description: At the end of your turn, take 15 damage.

cards.name: Reflex Radar
cards.description: Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Impossible Request
cards.description: gensokyo:Impossible_Request.

cards.name: All the World's Evil
cards.description: Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL characters.

cards.name: Apocalypse
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage to ALL enemies.
Take 10 damage.

cards.name: Apocalypse+
cards.description:
Deal 30 damage to ALL enemies.
Take 15 damage.

cards.name: Doppelganger
cards.description:
Scry X.
Your next X cards are played twice.

cards.name: Doppelganger+
cards.description:
Scry X + 1.
Your next X + 1 cards are played twice.

cards.name: Eight Feet Tall
cards.description: Target non-boss enemy dies in 4 turns.

cards.name: Eight Feet Tall+
cards.description: Target non-boss enemy dies in 4 turns.

cards.name: Gap Woman
cards.description: Apply 99 Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Gap Woman+
cards.description: Apply 99 Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: HAARP
cards.description: At the start of your turn, Channel 2 Lightning.

cards.name: HAARP+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, Channel 2 Lightning.

cards.name: Kunekune
cards.description: Apply 2 gensokyo:Lunacy.

cards.name: Kunekune+
cards.description: Apply 2 gensokyo:Lunacy.

cards.name: Little Green Men
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E].
Put a copy of this card on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Little Green Men+
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E].
Put a copy of this card on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Loch Ness Monster
cards.description: Deal 5 damage 6 times.

cards.name: Loch Ness Monster+
cards.description: Deal 5 damage 8 times.

cards.name: Manor of the Dishes
cards.description: Whenever you play 10 cards, gain 1 Intangible.

cards.name: Manor of the Dishes+
cards.description: Whenever you play 10 cards, gain 1 Intangible.

cards.name: Men in Black
cards.description: Gain 1 Intangible.

cards.name: Men in Black+
cards.description: Gain 1 Intangible.

cards.name: Miss Mary
cards.description: Apply 99 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Miss Mary+
cards.description: Apply 99 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Monkey's Paw
cards.description:
Lose half of your current HP.
Gain 10 Gold for each HP lost this way.

cards.name: Monkey's Paw+
cards.description:
Lose half of your current HP.
Gain 13 Gold for each HP lost this way.

cards.name: Red Cape Blue Cape
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Deal 10 damage.
Add gensokyo:Red_Cape and gensokyo:Blue_Cape to your hand.

cards.name: Red Cape Blue Cape+
cards.description:
Gain 13 Block.
Deal 13 damage.
Add gensokyo:Red_Cape+ and gensokyo:Blue_Cape+ to your hand.

cards.name: Seven School Mysteries
cards.description: Whenever you play 7 cards in a single turn, gain 2 Strength and 2 Dexterity.

cards.name: Seven School Mysteries+
cards.description: Whenever you play 7 cards in a single turn, gain 2 Strength and 2 Dexterity.

cards.name: Slit Mouthed Woman
cards.description:
The next time you are attacked, apply 3 Vulnerable to the attacker.
The second next time you are attacked, the attacker loses 3 Strength.

cards.name: Slit Mouthed Woman+
cards.description:
The next time you are attacked, apply 4 Vulnerable to the attacker.
The second next time you are attacked, the attacker loses 4 Strength.

cards.name: Spontaneous Human Combustion
cards.description:
Gain 5 Strength.
At the end of your turn, take 1 damage and increase the damage you will take from this power by 1.

cards.name: Spontaneous Human Combustion+
cards.description:
Gain 7 Strength.
At the end of your turn, take 1 damage and increase the damage you will take from this power by 1.

cards.name: Teke Teke
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage 3 times to ALL enemies.
Whenever this brings an enemy below half HP, increase its damage by 7 and reduce its cost by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Teke Teke+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage 3 times to ALL enemies.
Whenever this brings an enemy below half HP, increase its damage by 10 and reduce its cost by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Turbo Granny
cards.description:
Gain 3 Dexterity.
Gain 3 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Turbo Granny+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Dexterity.
Gain 4 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Blemished Steel
cards.description:
Random rare relic.
gensokyo:Evolve 4.

cards.name: Depleted Generator
cards.description:
Rare card reward.
gensokyo:Evolve 2.

cards.name: Lifeforce Converter
cards.description:
Give ALL non-X-cost cards in your hand gensokyo:Bloodcast this combat.
gensokyo:Item 2.

cards.name: Locked Medkit
cards.description:
Heal to full HP.
gensokyo:Evolve 5.

cards.name: Medicine Kit
cards.description:
Remove all of your debuffs and heal 2 HP for each debuff removed.
gensokyo:Item 2.

cards.name: Overcharged Core
cards.description:
Gain 3 Strength, Dexterity, and Focus.
Lose 3 HP.
gensokyo:Item 1.

cards.name: RPG
cards.description:
Deal 25 damage to ALL enemies.
gensokyo:Item 3.

cards.name: Reactive Armor
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block for each enemy in combat.
gensokyo:Item 3.

cards.name: Rusty Chest
cards.description:
300 gold.
gensokyo:Evolve 2.

cards.name: Scrap Iron
cards.description:
Random common relic.
gensokyo:Evolve 2.

cards.name: Shovel
cards.description:
Random relic.
gensokyo:Evolve 3.

cards.name: Tarnished Gold
cards.description:
200 gold.
gensokyo:Evolve 3.

cards.name: Taser
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Apply 1 Stun.
gensokyo:Item 2.

cards.name: Training Manual
cards.description:
Upgraded card reward.
gensokyo:Evolve 1.

cards.name: Brilliant Dragon Bullet
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Draw 1 card. If it's an Attack, deal 10 damage again.

cards.name: Brilliant Dragon Bullet+
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
Draw 1 card. If it's an Attack, deal 13 damage again.

cards.name: Salamander Shield
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block.
Draw 1 card. If it's a Skill, gain 9 Block again.

cards.name: Salamander Shield+
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Draw 1 card. If it's a Skill, gain 12 Block again.

cards.name: Buddhist Diamond
cards.description:
Deal 24 damage.
When this card is discarded by Scry, increase its damage by 16 this combat.

cards.name: Buddhist Diamond+
cards.description:
Deal 30 damage.
When this card is discarded by Scry, increase its damage by 20 this combat.

cards.name: Everlasting Life
cards.description:
Gain 20 Block.
Scry 4.

cards.name: Everlasting Life+
cards.description:
Gain 24 Block.
Scry 6.

cards.name: Morning Mist
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Morning Mist+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: New Moon
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: New Moon+
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Dawn
cards.description: Whenever this card is drawn, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Dawn+
cards.description: Whenever this card is drawn, gain [E] [E] and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Dreamlike Paradise
cards.description:
Scry 3.
Cards discarded this way cost 0 until played.
Whenever this card is drawn, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Dreamlike Paradise+
cards.description:
Scry 4.
Cards discarded this way cost 0 until played.
Whenever this card is drawn, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Hourai in a Pot
cards.description: Discard any number of cards then draw that many.

cards.name: Hourai in a Pot+
cards.description:
Discard any number of cards then draw that many.
Whenever this card is drawn, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Life Spring Infinity
cards.description: Draw 3 cards. Gain 10 Block for every Skill drawn this way.

cards.name: Life Spring Infinity+
cards.description: Draw 3 cards. Gain 13 Block for every Skill drawn this way.

cards.name: Morning Star
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Deal 10 damage.
Exhaust ALL your Status cards.

cards.name: Morning Star+
cards.description:
Gain 13 Block.
Deal 13 damage.
Exhaust ALL your Status cards.

cards.name: Rainbow Danmaku
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
Scry 5.
For every Attack discarded this way, deal 20 damage again.

cards.name: Rainbow Danmaku+
cards.description:
Deal 25 damage.
Scry 5.
For every Attack discarded this way, deal 25 damage again.

cards.name: Rising World
cards.description:
Scry 3.
Cards discarded this way are Upgraded.
Whenever this card is drawn, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Rising World+
cards.description:
Scry 4.
Cards discarded this way are Upgraded.
Whenever this card is drawn, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Unhurried Mind
cards.description: Play the top 2 cards of your draw pile.

cards.name: Unhurried Mind+
cards.description: Play the top 2 cards of your draw pile.

cards.name: Unlikely Aid
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Choose 1 of 3 cards from your master deck to add to your hand. It costs 0 this turn and exhausts.

cards.name: Unlikely Aid+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Choose 1 of 5 cards from your master deck to add to your hand. It costs 0 this turn and exhausts.

relics.name: Bombinomicon
relics.description: At the start of combat, add The Bomb+ with Retain and Exhaust to your hand.
relics.flavorText: Explode spectacularly on death.

relics.name: Book of Specters
relics.description: At the start of your turn, draw 2 cards. Discard all non-Attack cards drawn this way.
relics.flavorText: A book written by a lonely necromancer who just wanted to make some friends.

relics.name: Celestial's Flawless Clothing
relics.description: When you would die, heal to full HP and add an Avatar of Death to the current encounter. Only works while in combat and will not trigger if an Avatar of Death is already present.
relics.flavorText: It feels heavenly.

relics.name: Chorus of Joy
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain [E] and discard 2 cards.
relics.flavorText: A joyful melody for dispirited times.

relics.name: Conqueror of Fear
relics.description: While there are 10 or more cards in your discard pile, you have an additional 2 Strength and Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.

relics.name: Demon Mask
relics.description: At the end of your turn, if you did not play any non-Attack cards this turn, gain 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: A mask for thunderous surprise.

relics.name: Dirge of Melancholy
relics.description: At the start of combat, lose [E] and ALL enemies lose 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: A mournful melody for nostalgic times.

relics.name: Dual Wield
relics.description: Your single-target Attacks deal damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Rip and tear, a bloody grin. Reap and sow, a horrid din.

relics.name: Empty Grave
relics.description: After climbing 3 floors, heal 50% of your Max HP.
relics.flavorText: I am not there. I did not die.

relics.name: Fox Mask
relics.description: Whenever you draw a Status card, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: A mask for the serious and determined.

relics.name: Justice
relics.description: The first time you play 2 Attacks each turn, deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: The dead cannot cry out for justice. It is a duty of the living to do so for them.

relics.name: Lion Mask
relics.description: Whenever you play a Skill, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: A mask for the joyful and delighted.

relics.name: Lunatic Red Eyes
relics.description: At the start of combat, apply 1 gensokyo:Lunacy to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: These eyes have no effect on you. After all, you're already insane.

relics.name: Mask of Hope
relics.description: The first time you lose HP each combat, gain 10 Temporary HP.
relics.flavorText: A mask for humor and cheer.

relics.name: Mercy
relics.description: The first time you play 2 Skills each turn, gain 3 Block.
relics.flavorText: It is mercy, not justice or courage or even heroism, that alone can defeat evil.

relics.name: Moses's Miracle
relics.description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, add a Miracle to your hand.
relics.flavorText: "A miracle that parts the sea. Which makes it easy to catch fish, apparently." - The Grimoire of Marisa

relics.name: Nagashi-bina Doll
relics.description: At the end of your turn, exhaust a random Curse in your hand.
relics.flavorText: If you look closely, you can almost see the tendrils of misfortune seeping into the doll.

relics.name: Occult Ball
relics.description: At the start of combat, add a random Urban Legend to your hand. Occasionally find more Occult Balls.
relics.flavorText: It is said that if you collect seven of them, they would make your wildest dreams come true.

relics.name: Perfect Cherry Blossom
relics.description: The next time you would die, heal to 10% of your Max HP instead. Whenever you would die, kill ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: A favor bestowed upon you for befriending a lonely girl.

relics.name: Portable Gap
relics.description: You may ignore paths and distances when choosing the next room to travel to. Whenever you use this effect, lose 3 Max HP.
relics.flavorText: As you stare into the abyss, a thousand eyes stare back at you.

relics.name: Red Star
relics.description: Your Max HP is reduced by 50% for the next boss fight. After, obtain a special card.
relics.flavorText: An ill omen feared by many.

relics.name: Song of Souls
relics.description: Whenever you play a Strike or Defend card, exhaust it.
relics.flavorText: A youthful melody for all of time.

relics.name: Spider Mask
relics.description: The first time you play an Attack each turn, apply 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: A mask for the angry and enraged.

relics.name: The Crow
relics.description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Ritual and take damage equal to the amount of Strength you have.
relics.flavorText: Power beckons, sweet and smile. Madness answers, bleak and vile.

relics.name: The Day the Sea Split
relics.description: Your Skills exhaust when played for 3 combats. After, obtain a special relic.
relics.flavorText: The sea, once it casts its spell, holds one in its net of wonder forever.

relics.name: Undefined Darkness
relics.description: Your cards are obscured for 1 combat. After, obtain a special relic.
relics.flavorText: Fear comes in all shapes and sizes.

relics.name: Youkai Flower
relics.description: Every 3 turns, gain [E] [E] .
relics.flavorText: The flower seems to be watching you, always craning its neck to follow you around wherever you are.

keywords.name: Bloodcast
keywords.description: When you have insufficient [E] to play this card, you may instead pay 1 HP for every missing [E] .

keywords.name: Blue Cape
keywords.description: A 1 cost Skill that gains Block, Retains, and exhausts.

keywords.name: Evolve
keywords.description: Transforms into a special reward after being played the specified number of times.

keywords.name: Impossible Request
keywords.description:
Retain. Cannot be exhausted.
Your progress on the requests is tracked no matter where this card is.

keywords.name: Item
keywords.description: Removed from your master deck after being played the specified number of times.

keywords.name: Pet
keywords.description: A summon that you can issue an order to every turn. If the pet dies, its respective pet card is removed from the deck. The pet’s HP persists between combats and is fully restored when you rest at a campfire. You can only have one pet summoned at a time.

keywords.name: Red Cape
keywords.description: A 1 cost Attack that deals damage, Retains, and exhausts.

keywords.name: Gensokyo:fortitude
keywords.description: Fortified creatures receive 33% less attack damage.

keywords.name: Gensokyo:lunacy
keywords.description: Whenever a lunatic enemy attacks, a random enemy is targeted instead.

keywords.name: Gensokyo:vigor
keywords.description: Vigorous creatures deal 34% more attack damage.
